hypothesis: Joaquin Phoenix earned a Best Actor nomination for portraying Freddie Quell in The Master.
premise: + Joaquin Phoenix + He has subsequently earned Best Actor nominations for portraying musician Johnny Cash in the biopic Walk the Line ( 2005 ) and for his role as Freddie Quell , a sex-obsessed alcoholic World War II veteran in the drama film The Master ( 2012 ) , the latter winning him the Volpi Cup for Best Actor . + The Master (2012 film) + It tells the story of Freddie Quell ( Phoenix ) , a World War II veteran struggling to adjust to a post-war society , who meets Lancaster Dodd ( Hoffman ) , a leader of a religious movement known as `` The Cause '' . + The Master (2012 film) + The Master is a 2012 American psychological drama film written , directed , and co-produced by Paul Thomas Anderson and starring Joaquin Phoenix , Philip Seymour Hoffman , and Amy Adams .
explanation_1: Joaquin Phoenix earned a Best Actor nomination for portraying Freddie Quell in The Master.
